| History                 = The Peace Corps is a non-governmental organization dedicated to peace on [[Earth]].

The Peace Corps (as well as college campuses, [[Greenpeace (Earth-616)|Greenpeace]] or [[Habitat for Humanity (Earth-616)|Habitat for Humanity]]) was also a recruitment source for [[Hydra (Earth-616)|Hydra]] in their rebuilding following the [[Skrull Empire|Skrulls]]' [[Secret Invasion]] and the consequent loss of 15,000 agents and the [[Ichor (Hydra Base)|Ichor base]] by [[Wolfgang von Strucker (Earth-616)|Strucker]] in order to root off the infiltration. Hydra's indoctrination techniques, seemingly more efficient on applicants with a "do-gooder mentality", with a retention rate of eighty-two percent among the individuals approached among the Peace Corps.{{r|Secret Warriors #2}}
